name: Steamy Good Wintry Mushroom Soup
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together seasoning with milk; set aside.
Place mushrooms and butter in a Round Steamer. Cover; microwave on high until mushrooms start to release juices and are tender with a bite, about 5 min, stirring halfway through.
Stir in reserved seasoning mixture. Microwave on high, uncovered, for 15 min, stirring every 5 min until soup is bubby and has thickened slightly.
tips: Save prep time and buy a package of pre-sliced mushrooms. Or, mix and match—choose your favourite kinds for a medley of flavour. You’ll need a generous 1⁄2 lb (225 g) whole mushrooms.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with an open-faced or half sandwich made with 1 slice whole-grain bread, 1⁄2 tbsp mayo, 1⁄2 cup lean protein (chicken or canned salmon), and 1⁄2 cup leafy greens.
